mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve navigation touch targets for easier interaction on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and leverage browser caching to improve load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Increase keyword usage in headers and meta descriptions for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Consider adding a sticky navigation bar to enhance usability across pages.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of form fields required.
tips: Consider integrating social proof such as reviews or testimonials to build trust.
Improve accessibility with proper contrast ratios and alt text for images.
